title: Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility create properties payload schema
description: This schema defines the payload required to create one or more properties for the Legal Aid Check Financial Eligibility API

outstanding_mortgage.description: The amount outstanding on any mortgage

percentage_owned.description: The percentage share of the property which is owned by the applicant

shared_with_housing_assoc.description: Whether or not this house is shared with a housing association

assessment_id.description: The UUID of the assessment returned from the call to the assessment endpoint

additional_properties.description: An array of objects describing properties, which is no the applicant's main home

items.description: The applicant's property which is not their main home
